00000.subtitle: successful_completion
00000.Cause: The command completed successfully without errors.

01000.subtitle: warning
01000.Cause: The server issued a non-fatal warning.
01000.Action: Review the warning details and adjust SQL or settings if needed.

0100C.title: 0100C
0100C.subtitle: dynamic_result_sets_returned
0100C.Cause: The routine returned dynamic result sets (warning).
0100C.Action: Fetch remaining result sets or ignore if not needed.

01008.subtitle: implicit_zero_bit_padding
01008.Cause: Bit string was implicitly padded with zeros.
01008.Action: Adjust bit lengths or handle padding in application logic.

01003.subtitle: null_value_eliminated_in_set_function
01003.Cause: NULL values were eliminated in an aggregate or set function.
01003.Action: Account for NULL filtering or coalesce values as appropriate.

01007.subtitle: privilege_not_granted
01007.Cause: A privilege reference did not exist to be granted/revoked.
01007.Action: Verify existing privileges and correct GRANT/REVOKE.

01006.subtitle: privilege_not_revoked
01006.Cause: REVOKE could not remove a privilege not present.
01006.Action: Check current privileges and revoke only existing ones.

01004.subtitle: string_data_right_truncation
01004.Cause: A character value was truncated (warning variant).
01004.Action: Increase target length or validate/shorten input.

02000.subtitle: no_data
02000.Cause: A query or FETCH returned no rows.
02000.Action: Handle empty result sets or adjust filters.

02001.subtitle: no_additional_dynamic_result_sets_returned
02001.Cause: No more dynamic result sets are available.

03000.subtitle: sql_statement_not_yet_complete
03000.Action: Complete the statement syntax and resubmit.

08000.subtitle: connection_exception
08000.Action: Check network, server status, SSL, and client settings.

08003.subtitle: connection_does_not_exist
08003.Cause: Operation attempted on a closed/invalid connection.

08006.subtitle: connection_failure
08006.Action: Inspect logs, timeouts, keepalives, and retry logic.

08001.subtitle: sqlclient_unable_to_establish_sqlconnection
08001.Cause: Client could not establish a connection.
08001.Action: Verify host/port, auth, pg_hba.conf, SSL, and server listening.

08004.subtitle: sqlserver_rejected_establishment_of_sqlconnection
08004.Action: Check pg_hba.conf rules, user permissions, and authentication method.

08007.subtitle: transaction_resolution_unknown
08007.Cause: Outcome of a two-phase transaction is unknown.
08007.Action: Check pg_prepared_xacts and coordinator logs to resolve.

08P01.title: 08P01
08P01.subtitle: protocol_violation
08P01.Action: Update drivers and ensure protocol compatibility.

09000.subtitle: triggered_action_exception
09000.Cause: An exception occurred due to a triggered action.
09000.Action: Review trigger logic and constraints involved.

0B000.title: 0B000
0B000.subtitle: invalid_transaction_initiation
0B000.Cause: Invalid attempt to initiate a transaction.
0B000.Action: Start transactions with valid statements and context.

0F000.title: 0F000
0F000.subtitle: locator_exception
0F000.Cause: An error related to large object/locator usage.
0F000.Action: Use valid locators and ensure they are in scope and initialized.

0F001.title: 0F001
0F001.subtitle: invalid_locator_specification
0F001.Cause: Locator specification is invalid or out of scope.
0F001.Action: Provide a valid locator and correct lifetime/transaction scope.

0L000.title: 0L000
0L000.subtitle: invalid_grantor
0L000.Cause: Grantor is not permitted to grant the specified privilege.
0L000.Action: Use owner/superuser or role with GRANT OPTION.

0LP01.title: 0LP01
0LP01.subtitle: invalid_grant_operation
0LP01.Cause: GRANT/REVOKE is invalid for the object/privilege.
0LP01.Action: Use valid privilege names for the target object type.

0P000.title: 0P000
0P000.subtitle: invalid_role_specification
0P000.Cause: Referenced role is invalid or does not exist.
0P000.Action: Create or reference an existing role; check spelling/quoting.

0Z000.title: 0Z000
0Z000.subtitle: diagnostics_exception
0Z000.Action: Access diagnostics only within a valid exception handler context.

0Z002.title: 0Z002
0Z002.subtitle: stacked_diagnostics_accessed_without_active_handler
0Z002.Cause: Diagnostics accessed without an active handler.
0Z002.Action: Use GET DIAGNOSTICS inside an active handler.

10608.subtitle: invalid_argument_for_xquery
10608.Cause: An invalid argument was supplied to an XQuery function.
10608.Action: Validate XQuery arguments and types per the function spec.

20000.subtitle: case_not_found
20000.Cause: CASE expression had no matching WHEN and no ELSE.
20000.Action: Add an ELSE or ensure a WHEN always matches.

21000.subtitle: cardinality_violation
21000.Cause: More than one row returned where one was expected.
21000.Action: Constrain the subquery or adjust logic to ensure single row.

22000.subtitle: data_exception
22000.Action: Review specific subcode and correct the offending data/value.

2202E.title: 2202E
2202E.subtitle: array_subscript_error
2202E.Cause: Array subscript out of bounds or invalid.

22021.subtitle: character_not_in_repertoire
22021.Cause: Character not representable in target encoding.
22021.Action: Use compatible encoding or normalize/replace characters.

22008.subtitle: datetime_field_overflow
22008.Cause: Date/time field out of range or invalid.
22008.Action: Validate fields and ranges; fix invalid intervals.

22012.subtitle: division_by_zero
22012.Action: Guard denominator; filter or NULLIF zero values.

22005.subtitle: error_in_assignment
22005.Cause: Type assignment failed due to incompatible value.
22005.Action: Cast properly or correct input value to target type.

2200B.title: 2200B
2200B.subtitle: escape_character_conflict
2200B.Action: Choose a different ESCAPE or escape correctly.

22022.subtitle: indicator_overflow
22022.Action: Use larger indicator type or constrain values.

22015.subtitle: interval_field_overflow
22015.Cause: Interval field value out of allowed range.
22015.Action: Use valid field values or a compatible interval precision.

2201E.title: 2201E
2201E.subtitle: invalid_argument_for_logarithm
2201E.Action: Validate inputs to be positive non-zero.

22014.subtitle: invalid_argument_for_ntile_function
22014.Action: Provide a positive integer bucket count.

22016.subtitle: invalid_argument_for_nth_value_function
22016.Action: Provide a positive integer position and valid frame.

2201F.title: 2201F
2201F.subtitle: invalid_argument_for_power_function
2201F.Cause: POWER received invalid arguments (e.g., 0^0, negative base with fractional exponent).
2201F.Action: Validate domain of inputs or cast appropriately.

2201G.title: 2201G
2201G.subtitle: invalid_argument_for_width_bucket_function
2201G.Action: Ensure finite numeric values and positive bucket count.

22018.subtitle: invalid_character_value_for_cast
22018.Cause: String cannot be cast to the target type.
22018.Action: Normalize input, use proper formats or casts.

22007.subtitle: invalid_datetime_format
22007.Cause: Input datetime does not match expected format.
22007.Action: Use correct format or parsing functions; set DateStyle/TimeZone.

22019.subtitle: invalid_escape_character
22019.Action: Use a valid escape character per SQL syntax.

2200D.title: 2200D
2200D.subtitle: invalid_escape_octet
2200D.Cause: Invalid octet in an escape sequence.
2200D.Action: Use valid octet values or correct encoding.

22025.subtitle: invalid_escape_sequence
22025.Action: Correct the escape syntax or escape properly.

22P06.title: 22P06
22P06.subtitle: nonstandard_use_of_escape_character
22P06.Action: Use standard SQL escapes or set standard_conforming_strings.

22023.subtitle: invalid_parameter_value
22023.Cause: Parameter value out of allowed domain.

22013.subtitle: invalid_preceding_or_following_size
22013.Action: Use non-negative sizes and valid frame clauses.

2201B.title: 2201B
2201B.subtitle: invalid_regular_expression
2201B.Action: Fix pattern syntax/flags to PostgreSQL regex flavor.

2202H.title: 2202H
2202H.subtitle: invalid_tablesample_argument
2202H.Cause: TABLESAMPLE argument invalid (e.g., out of range).
2202H.Action: Use valid sampling method arguments per docs.

2202G.title: 2202G
2202G.subtitle: invalid_tablesample_repeat
2202G.Action: Provide a valid REPEATABLE seed value.

22009.subtitle: invalid_time_zone_displacement_value
22009.Action: Use valid time zone offset format.

2200C.title: 2200C
2200C.subtitle: invalid_use_of_escape_character
2200C.Cause: Escape character used in invalid context.

2200G.title: 2200G
2200G.subtitle: most_specific_type_mismatch
2200G.Action: Cast operands consistently or adjust expression types.

22004.subtitle: null_value_not_allowed
22004.Action: Provide non-NULL values or alter constraint if appropriate.

22002.subtitle: null_value_no_indicator_parameter
22002.Action: Supply an indicator or avoid NULL in this context.

22003.subtitle: numeric_value_out_of_range
22003.Action: Use wider type or validate ranges.

2200H.title: 2200H
2200H.subtitle: sequence_generator_limit_exceeded
2200H.Action: ALTER SEQUENCE bounds or CYCLE/RESTART; use larger type.

22026.subtitle: string_data_length_mismatch
22026.Cause: String length does not match required length semantics.
22026.Action: Adjust value or use compatible type (CHAR/VARCHAR/TEXT).

22024.subtitle: unterminated_c_string
22024.Action: Properly close quotes and escape characters.

2200F.title: 2200F
2200F.subtitle: zero_length_character_string
2200F.Cause: Empty string not allowed in this context.
2200F.Action: Provide a non-empty string or relax constraint.

22P01.title: 22P01
22P01.subtitle: floating_point_exception
22P01.Action: Validate inputs; guard divide-by-zero; consider numeric.

22P02.title: 22P02
22P02.subtitle: invalid_text_representation
22P02.Cause: Malformed input syntax for a type.
22P02.Action: Validate/clean inputs; use explicit casts and constraints.

22P03.title: 22P03
22P03.subtitle: invalid_binary_representation
22P03.Cause: Malformed binary input for a type.

22P04.title: 22P04
22P04.subtitle: bad_copy_file_format
22P04.Cause: COPY data inconsistent with declared format.
22P04.Action: Fix delimiter/quote/escape/NULL settings and cleanse file.

22P05.title: 22P05
22P05.subtitle: untranslatable_character
22P05.Cause: Character cannot be converted between encodings.
22P05.Action: Align client/server encodings or normalize to UTF-8.

2200L.title: 2200L
2200L.subtitle: not_an_xml_document
2200L.Cause: Value is not a well-formed XML document.
2200L.Action: Provide a proper XML document (single root, well-formed).

2200M.title: 2200M
2200M.subtitle: invalid_xml_document
2200M.Cause: XML document is invalid per XML rules.

2200N.title: 2200N
2200N.subtitle: invalid_xml_content
2200N.Cause: Invalid content found in XML value.

2200S.title: 2200S
2200S.subtitle: invalid_xml_comment
2200S.Action: Ensure comments do not contain '--' and are closed.

22030.subtitle: duplicate_json_object_key_value
22030.Cause: Duplicate key in JSON object where unique keys required.
22030.Action: Deduplicate keys or use jsonb semantics accordingly.

22031.subtitle: invalid_argument_for_sql_json_datetime_function
22031.Cause: Invalid argument to SQL/JSON datetime function.
22031.Action: Supply valid datetime text and format per function spec.

22032.subtitle: invalid_json_text
22032.Cause: JSON text is not valid per SQL/JSON rules.
22032.Action: Provide valid JSON; validate with json/jsonb parsers.

22033.subtitle: invalid_sql_json_subscript
22033.Cause: JSON subscript invalid for target item.
22033.Action: Use valid array/object subscripts and types.

22034.subtitle: more_than_one_sql_json_item
22034.Cause: Operation produced multiple items where one required.
22034.Action: Constrain JSON path or use an aggregate/array.

22035.subtitle: no_sql_json_item
22035.Cause: No JSON item matched where one required.
22035.Action: Adjust path/predicate to ensure a match or handle absence.

22036.subtitle: non_numeric_sql_json_item
22036.Cause: Non-numeric JSON item used where numeric required.
22036.Action: Cast/convert item or validate types before use.

22037.subtitle: non_unique_keys_in_a_json_object
22037.Cause: JSON object contains non-unique keys where prohibited.

22038.subtitle: singleton_sql_json_item_required
22038.Cause: A single JSON item was required but multiple/none found.
22038.Action: Ensure path selects exactly one item.

22039.subtitle: sql_json_array_not_found
22039.Cause: Expected JSON array but not found.
22039.Action: Adjust path or ensure the item is an array.

2203A.title: 2203A
2203A.subtitle: sql_json_member_not_found
2203A.Action: Use correct member name or handle absence.

2203B.title: 2203B
2203B.subtitle: sql_json_number_not_found
2203B.Action: Ensure item is numeric or convert accordingly.

2203C.title: 2203C
2203C.subtitle: sql_json_object_not_found
2203C.Action: Ensure item is an object or adjust path.

2203D.title: 2203D
2203D.subtitle: too_many_json_array_elements
2203D.Cause: Too many elements for the requested JSON array operation.
2203D.Action: Constrain the array or use a limit.

2203E.title: 2203E
2203E.subtitle: too_many_json_object_members
2203E.Cause: Too many members for the requested JSON object operation.
2203E.Action: Limit members or filter the object before processing.

2203F.title: 2203F
2203F.subtitle: sql_json_scalar_required
2203F.Cause: Scalar JSON value required but not provided.

2203G.title: 2203G
2203G.subtitle: sql_json_item_cannot_be_cast_to_target_type
2203G.Cause: JSON item cannot be cast to target SQL type.
2203G.Action: Convert/validate item or choose compatible target type.

23000.subtitle: integrity_constraint_violation
23000.Action: Review specific subcode and correct data or schema.

23001.subtitle: restrict_violation
23001.Action: Drop/alter dependents or use CASCADE with care.

23502.subtitle: not_null_violation
23502.Cause: NULL in a NOT NULL column.
23502.Action: Provide a value or relax the constraint.

23503.subtitle: foreign_key_violation
23503.Cause: Missing referenced row or action violates FK.
23503.Action: Insert parent first or use appropriate ON DELETE/UPDATE rules.

23505.subtitle: unique_violation
23505.Action: Deduplicate or use ON CONFLICT handling.

23514.subtitle: check_violation
23514.Action: Change data or adjust constraint definition.

23P01.title: 23P01
23P01.subtitle: exclusion_violation
23P01.Action: Modify values or adjust exclusion operator class.

24000.subtitle: invalid_cursor_state
24000.Cause: Cursor used in an invalid state.
24000.Action: Open/fetch/close in correct order; ensure rows remain.

25000.subtitle: invalid_transaction_state
25000.Cause: Statement used in an inappropriate transaction state.

25001.subtitle: active_sql_transaction
25001.Cause: Operation not allowed with an active transaction.

25002.subtitle: branch_transaction_already_active
25002.Cause: The branch transaction is already active.
25002.Action: Use a different branch or end the active one.

25008.subtitle: held_cursor_requires_same_isolation_level
25008.Cause: Held cursor used with a different isolation level.
25008.Action: Use same isolation level or avoid held cursors across changes.

25003.subtitle: inappropriate_access_mode_for_branch_transaction
25003.Cause: Access mode incompatible with branch transaction.
25003.Action: Choose an appropriate access mode for the branch.

25004.subtitle: inappropriate_isolation_level_for_branch_transaction
25004.Cause: Isolation level incompatible with branch transaction.
25004.Action: Use a supported isolation level for the branch.

25005.subtitle: no_active_sql_transaction_for_branch_transaction
25005.Cause: No active transaction for branch operation.
25005.Action: Start a transaction before branch actions.

25006.subtitle: read_only_sql_transaction
25006.Cause: Write attempted in a read-only transaction.
25006.Action: Switch to read-write or remove write operations.

25007.subtitle: schema_and_data_statement_mixing_not_supported
25007.Cause: Mixing schema changes with data statements not supported.
25007.Action: Separate DDL and DML into different transactions.

25P01.title: 25P01
25P01.subtitle: no_active_sql_transaction
25P01.Cause: A transactional statement requires an active transaction.
25P01.Action: BEGIN a transaction or rely on autocommit appropriately.

25P02.title: 25P02
25P02.subtitle: in_failed_sql_transaction
25P02.Cause: Transaction is aborted due to a prior error.

25P03.title: 25P03
25P03.subtitle: idle_in_transaction_session_timeout
25P03.Cause: Session idle within a transaction past timeout.
25P03.Action: Commit/rollback promptly; tune the timeout if needed.

25P04.title: 25P04
25P04.subtitle: transaction_timeout
25P04.Action: Optimize or increase the timeout cautiously.

26000.subtitle: invalid_sql_statement_name
26000.Action: Prepare/create the statement or correct the name.

27000.subtitle: triggered_data_change_violation
27000.Cause: Data change blocked by trigger-defined rule.
27000.Action: Review trigger and data to comply or adjust trigger.

28000.subtitle: invalid_authorization_specification
28000.Action: Verify role, membership, authentication method, pg_hba.conf.

28P01.title: 28P01
28P01.subtitle: invalid_password
28P01.Action: Use correct password or reset; ensure auth method matches (SCRAM/MD5).

2B000.title: 2B000
2B000.subtitle: dependent_privilege_descriptors_still_exist
2B000.Cause: Cannot drop due to dependent privilege descriptors.
2B000.Action: Remove dependent grants or objects, or use CASCADE carefully.

2BP01.title: 2BP01
2BP01.subtitle: dependent_objects_still_exist
2BP01.Action: Drop/alter dependents or use CASCADE with caution.

2D000.title: 2D000
2D000.subtitle: invalid_transaction_termination
2D000.Action: Ensure an active transaction and proper context.

2F000.title: 2F000
2F000.subtitle: sql_routine_exception
2F000.Action: Review routine body, permissions, and subcodes.

2F005.title: 2F005
2F005.subtitle: function_executed_no_return_statement
2F005.Action: Add RETURN of the correct type in all code paths.

2F002.title: 2F002
2F002.subtitle: modifying_sql_data_not_permitted
2F002.Cause: Routine not permitted to modify SQL data.
2F002.Action: Change routine attributes or avoid data modification.

2F004.title: 2F004
2F004.subtitle: reading_sql_data_not_permitted
2F004.Cause: Routine not permitted to read SQL data.
2F004.Action: Adjust routine attributes or avoid reads.

34000.subtitle: invalid_cursor_name
34000.Action: Declare the cursor or correct its name.

38001.subtitle: containing_sql_not_permitted
38001.Cause: Containing SQL not permitted for this routine.
38001.Action: Avoid containing SQL or change routine attributes.

38002.subtitle: modifying_sql_data_not_permitted
38002.Cause: External routine cannot modify SQL data.
38002.Action: Alter routine permissions/attributes or remove modifications.

38004.subtitle: reading_sql_data_not_permitted
38004.Cause: External routine cannot read SQL data.

39000.subtitle: external_routine_invocation_exception
39000.Action: Validate function signature, language handler, and returns.

39004.subtitle: null_value_not_allowed
39004.Action: Ensure non-NULL where required; handle NULLs explicitly.

39P01.title: 39P01
39P01.subtitle: trigger_protocol_violated
39P01.Cause: Trigger did not follow required protocol.
39P01.Action: Fix trigger function to obey protocol (transition tables/new/old).

39P02.title: 39P02
39P02.subtitle: srf_protocol_violated
39P02.Action: Implement SRF according to expected protocol.

39P03.title: 39P03
39P03.subtitle: event_trigger_protocol_violated
39P03.Action: Conform to event trigger API requirements.

3B000.title: 3B000
3B000.subtitle: savepoint_exception
3B000.Action: Create before referencing and respect nesting.

3B001.title: 3B001
3B001.subtitle: invalid_savepoint_specification
3B001.Action: Use an existing savepoint within current transaction.

3D000.title: 3D000
3D000.subtitle: invalid_catalog_name
3D000.Action: Create it or connect to an existing database.

3F000.title: 3F000
3F000.subtitle: invalid_schema_name
3F000.Action: Create the schema or reference an existing one.

40000.subtitle: transaction_rollback
40000.Action: Identify cause and retry if appropriate.

40002.subtitle: transaction_integrity_constraint_violation
40002.Cause: Rollback due to integrity constraint violation.
40002.Action: Fix data to satisfy constraints and retry.

40001.subtitle: serialization_failure
40001.Action: Retry with backoff; reduce contention; review indexes.

40003.subtitle: statement_completion_unknown
40003.Action: Use idempotency or reconciliation to ensure final state.

40P01.title: 40P01
40P01.subtitle: deadlock_detected
40P01.Action: Retry; acquire locks in consistent order; shorten transactions.

42000.subtitle: syntax_error_or_access_rule_violation
42000.Action: Review subcode; fix SQL or privileges.

42501.subtitle: insufficient_privilege
42501.Action: GRANT privileges or use proper role.

42846.subtitle: cannot_coerce
42846.Cause: Implicit cast between types not available.
42846.Action: Use explicit CAST or compatible types.

42803.subtitle: grouping_error
42803.Cause: Non-aggregated columns not in GROUP BY.
42803.Action: Add to GROUP BY or aggregate properly.

42P20.title: 42P20
42P20.subtitle: windowing_error
42P20.Action: Correct window definitions and frame clauses.

42P19.title: 42P19
42P19.subtitle: invalid_recursion
42P19.Action: Ensure base/recursive terms and UNION ALL semantics are valid.

42830.subtitle: invalid_foreign_key
42830.Action: Reference PK/UNIQUE and match types/collations exactly.

42602.subtitle: invalid_name
42602.Action: Use valid identifiers or quote appropriately.

42804.subtitle: datatype_mismatch
42804.Cause: Expression data type mismatches expected type.
42804.Action: Cast or change to a compatible type.

42P18.title: 42P18
42P18.subtitle: indeterminate_datatype
42P18.Cause: Type cannot be determined from context.
42P18.Action: Add explicit casts or type annotations.

42P21.title: 42P21
42P21.subtitle: collation_mismatch
42P21.Action: Use COLLATE or convert inputs to a common collation.

42809.subtitle: wrong_object_type
42809.Cause: Command applied to wrong object type.
42809.Action: Use the correct command for the object type.

428C9.title: 428C9
428C9.subtitle: generated_always
428C9.Cause: Attempted to assign to generated column.
428C9.Action: Do not assign; change definition if manual writes needed.

42703.subtitle: undefined_column
42703.Action: Correct the column name or join to include it.

42883.subtitle: undefined_function
42883.Cause: No function matches name and argument types.
42883.Action: Create/enable function or cast arguments to a matching signature.

42P01.title: 42P01
42P01.subtitle: undefined_table
42P01.Cause: Table/view not found or not visible via search_path.
42P01.Action: Create it or schema-qualify; adjust search_path.

42P02.title: 42P02
42P02.subtitle: undefined_parameter
42P02.Action: Bind a value or replace with a literal.

42704.subtitle: undefined_object
42704.Action: Create it or reference an existing object.

42701.subtitle: duplicate_column
42701.Cause: Column with same name already exists.

42P03.title: 42P03
42P03.subtitle: duplicate_cursor
42P03.Cause: Cursor with the same name already exists.
42P03.Action: Use a unique name or close the existing cursor.

42P04.title: 42P04
42P04.subtitle: duplicate_database
42P04.Cause: Database with this name already exists.
42P04.Action: Choose another name or drop/rename existing database.

42723.subtitle: duplicate_function
42723.Action: Rename, change signature, or drop existing function.

42P05.title: 42P05
42P05.subtitle: duplicate_prepared_statement
42P05.Cause: Prepared statement with this name exists.
42P05.Action: Use a unique name or DEALLOCATE the existing one.

42P06.title: 42P06
42P06.subtitle: duplicate_schema
42P06.Cause: Schema with this name already exists.
42P06.Action: Use a different name or drop/rename existing schema.

42P07.title: 42P07
42P07.subtitle: duplicate_table
42P07.Cause: Table with this name already exists.
42P07.Action: Use IF NOT EXISTS, a different name, or drop existing.

42712.subtitle: duplicate_alias
42712.Cause: Alias duplicates another alias in scope.

42710.subtitle: duplicate_object
42710.Action: Rename new object or drop/rename the existing one.

42725.subtitle: ambiguous_function
42725.Cause: Function call resolves to multiple candidates.
42725.Action: Cast arguments or schema-qualify/rename to disambiguate.

42P08.title: 42P08
42P08.subtitle: ambiguous_parameter
42P08.Action: Bind parameters explicitly or cast to the intended type.

42P09.title: 42P09
42P09.subtitle: ambiguous_alias
42P09.Cause: Alias causes ambiguity in name resolution.

42P10.title: 42P10
42P10.subtitle: invalid_column_reference
42P10.Cause: Column reference invalid for the context.
42P10.Action: Group/aggregate appropriately or rewrite the query.

42611.subtitle: invalid_column_definition
42611.Action: Use valid type/default/constraints consistent with table.

42P13.title: 42P13
42P13.subtitle: invalid_function_definition
42P13.Action: Fix parameters, RETURNS, LANGUAGE, and attributes.

42P14.title: 42P14
42P14.subtitle: invalid_prepared_statement_definition
42P14.Action: Correct parameter types and statement text.

42P15.title: 42P15
42P15.subtitle: invalid_schema_definition
42P15.Action: Correct schema options or contained objects.

42P16.title: 42P16
42P16.subtitle: invalid_table_definition
42P16.Action: Fix column types, constraints, storage parameters, or options.

42P17.title: 42P17
42P17.subtitle: invalid_object_definition
42P17.Cause: Object definition invalid for its type.
42P17.Action: Use valid options/attributes for the object type.

44000.subtitle: with_check_option_violation
44000.Cause: INSERT/UPDATE fails view's WITH CHECK OPTION.
44000.Action: Change data to satisfy view predicate or alter the view.

53000.subtitle: insufficient_resources
53000.Action: Increase limits or reduce demand; see subcodes.

53100.subtitle: disk_full
53100.Action: Free space, expand storage, or move tablespaces.

53200.subtitle: out_of_memory
53200.Action: Tune work_mem/maintenance_work_mem; optimize queries; add RAM.

53300.subtitle: too_many_connections
53300.Action: Increase max_connections/pool; use a pooler; reduce churn.

54000.subtitle: program_limit_exceeded
54000.Action: Simplify query; add indexes; refactor schema/queries.

54001.subtitle: statement_too_complex
54001.Cause: Statement too complex for the planner.
54001.Action: Break into smaller statements or refactor.

54023.subtitle: too_many_arguments
54023.Action: Reduce arguments or use composite types.

55000.subtitle: object_not_in_prerequisite_state
55000.Action: Transition object to required state or defer operation.

55006.subtitle: object_in_use
55006.Cause: Object is in use by another session.
55006.Action: Wait, or terminate conflicting sessions if safe.

55P02.title: 55P02
55P02.subtitle: cant_change_runtime_param
55P02.Cause: Attempt to change a non-changeable or restart-required parameter.
55P02.Action: Change in postgresql.conf and restart, or use allowed scope.

55P03.title: 55P03
55P03.subtitle: lock_not_available
55P03.Cause: Required lock could not be acquired in time/policy.
55P03.Action: Retry, increase lock timeout, or reduce contention.

55P04.title: 55P04
55P04.subtitle: unsafe_new_enum_value_usage
55P04.Cause: New enum label used before all sessions see it.
55P04.Action: Avoid using new label until catalog changes are visible; reconnect sessions.

57000.subtitle: operator_intervention
57000.Action: Determine administrative action and retry if appropriate.

57014.subtitle: query_canceled
57014.Cause: Query canceled by user or timeout.
57014.Action: Optimize query or adjust timeouts; avoid manual cancellation.

57P01.title: 57P01
57P01.subtitle: admin_shutdown
57P01.Cause: Server shutting down by admin request.
57P01.Action: Reconnect after restart; make clients resilient.

57P02.title: 57P02
57P02.subtitle: crash_shutdown
57P02.Cause: Server shutting down because of a crash.
57P02.Action: Wait for recovery; investigate cause in logs.

57P03.title: 57P03
57P03.subtitle: cannot_connect_now
57P03.Cause: Server is starting up, shutting down, or in recovery.
57P03.Action: Retry when server reaches normal operation.

57P04.title: 57P04
57P04.subtitle: database_dropped
57P04.Cause: Database was dropped while in use.
57P04.Action: Reconnect to an existing database; adjust application logic.

57P05.title: 57P05
57P05.subtitle: idle_session_timeout
57P05.Action: Keep sessions active, close promptly, or increase timeout.

58030.subtitle: io_error
58030.Action: Investigate storage subsystem, dmesg, and file permissions.

58P01.title: 58P01
58P01.subtitle: undefined_file
58P01.Action: Verify path, existence, and permissions on server.

58P02.title: 58P02
58P02.subtitle: duplicate_file
58P02.Cause: File operation failed because file exists.
58P02.Action: Choose different path or remove/rename existing file.

58P03.title: 58P03
58P03.subtitle: file_name_too_long
58P03.Action: Shorten the name or change filesystem constraints.

F0000.title: F0000
F0000.subtitle: config_file_error
F0000.Action: Fix syntax/values in config files; reload or restart.

F0001.title: F0001
F0001.subtitle: lock_file_exists
F0001.Action: Ensure no server is running; remove stale lock after verification.

HV000.title: HV000
HV000.subtitle: fdw_error
HV000.Action: Check FDW server and options; review subcode for details.

HV005.title: HV005
HV005.subtitle: fdw_column_name_not_found
HV005.Cause: Foreign column name not found on remote.
HV005.Action: Correct column mapping or refresh foreign table.

HV002.title: HV002
HV002.subtitle: fdw_dynamic_parameter_value_needed
HV002.Cause: Dynamic parameter required for FDW operation.
HV002.Action: Provide the parameter value at execution time.

HV010.title: HV010
HV010.subtitle: fdw_function_sequence_error
HV010.Cause: Invalid sequence of FDW function calls.
HV010.Action: Follow required call order in FDW handler.

HV021.title: HV021
HV021.subtitle: fdw_inconsistent_descriptor_information
HV021.Action: Provide consistent descriptor fields and types.

HV024.title: HV024
HV024.subtitle: fdw_invalid_attribute_value
HV024.Cause: Invalid attribute value for FDW option.
HV024.Action: Use valid option values per FDW documentation.

HV007.title: HV007
HV007.subtitle: fdw_invalid_column_name
HV007.Action: Correct column name per remote schema.

HV004.title: HV004
HV004.subtitle: fdw_invalid_data_type
HV004.Action: Map to supported types or cast appropriately.

HV006.title: HV006
HV006.subtitle: fdw_invalid_data_type_descriptors
HV006.Cause: Invalid data type descriptors for FDW.

HV00B.title: HV00B
HV00B.subtitle: fdw_invalid_handle
HV00B.Action: Use a valid handle from correct initialization.

HV00C.title: HV00C
HV00C.subtitle: fdw_invalid_option_index
HV00C.Action: Use valid option index within range.

HV090.title: HV090
HV090.subtitle: fdw_invalid_string_length_or_buffer_length
HV090.Cause: Invalid string or buffer length for FDW.

HV00A.title: HV00A
HV00A.subtitle: fdw_invalid_string_format
HV00A.Action: Use expected format per FDW protocol.

HV009.title: HV009
HV009.subtitle: fdw_invalid_use_of_null_pointer
HV009.Cause: Invalid use of NULL pointer in FDW.

HV014.title: HV014
HV014.subtitle: fdw_too_many_handles
HV014.Action: Release handles or raise FDW limits if possible.

HV001.title: HV001
HV001.subtitle: fdw_out_of_memory
HV001.Action: Optimize memory usage or add resources.

HV00P.title: HV00P
HV00P.subtitle: fdw_no_schemas
HV00P.Cause: No schemas available on remote for FDW.
HV00P.Action: Ensure remote schemas exist and are accessible.

HV00K.title: HV00K
HV00K.subtitle: fdw_reply_handle
HV00K.Action: Use a valid reply handle from FDW call sequence.

HV00Q.title: HV00Q
HV00Q.subtitle: fdw_schema_not_found
HV00Q.Action: Correct schema mapping or ensure remote schema exists.

HV00L.title: HV00L
HV00L.subtitle: fdw_unable_to_create_execution
HV00L.Cause: FDW could not create execution object.
HV00L.Action: Check server options/resources; correct handler implementation.

HV00M.title: HV00M
HV00M.subtitle: fdw_unable_to_create_reply
HV00M.Cause: FDW could not create reply object.

HV00N.title: HV00N
HV00N.subtitle: fdw_unable_to_establish_connection
HV00N.Cause: FDW cannot connect to remote server.
HV00N.Action: Verify foreign server, credentials, and network.

P0000.title: P0000
P0000.subtitle: plpgsql_error
P0000.Action: Inspect function code and RAISE diagnostics.

P0001.title: P0001
P0001.subtitle: raise_exception
P0001.Action: Handle or remove RAISE; return appropriate SQLSTATE.

P0002.title: P0002
P0002.subtitle: no_data_found
P0002.Cause: SELECT/FETCH returned no rows where one expected.
P0002.Action: Check FOUND or handle empty results.

P0003.title: P0003
P0003.subtitle: too_many_rows
P0003.Cause: Statement expecting single row returned multiple.
P0003.Action: Ensure uniqueness or LIMIT 1 with deterministic order.

P0004.title: P0004
P0004.subtitle: assert_failure
P0004.Action: Fix violated assumption or remove ASSERT in production.

XX000.title: XX000
XX000.subtitle: internal_error
XX000.Action: Check logs; update to supported version; report with repro if persistent.

XX001.title: XX001
XX001.subtitle: data_corrupted
XX001.Action: Restore from backups; run integrity checks; investigate hardware/storage.

XX002.title: XX002
XX002.subtitle: index_corrupted
XX002.Action: REINDEX affected index; investigate hardware and upgrade if fixes exist.
